sentence.Network_en: An all-inclusive two-week holiday costs around £880 per person.
sentence.Network_cn: 为期两周、包括所有费用的度假大约每人花费880英镑。

sentence.Network_en: Our trips are all-inclusive—there are no hidden costs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的旅行费用全包—没有任何隐含性费用。

sentence.Network_en: The bill is inclusive of the food and lodging.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from medieval Latin inclusivus, from Latin includere (see include)

entry.tran: 包括一切费用在内的;包含(邮费和包装费)的
entry.def: If a price is inclusive, it includes all the charges connected with the goods or services offered. If a price is inclusive of postage and packing, it includes the charge for this.

example.tran: 所有的价格都包括运费在内。

entry.tran: 首末项包括在内的;包括一切项目在内的
entry.def: After stating the first and last item in a set of things, you can add inclusive to make it clear that the items stated are included in the set.

example.ex: Training will commence on 5 October, running from Tuesday to Saturday inclusive.
example.tran: 培训将于 10 月 5 日开始,从星期二(含)到星期六(含)。

example.ex: ...£20 for senior citizens and children (5 to 16 inclusive).
example.tran: 老人与儿童(5 至 16 岁，包含 5 岁和 16 岁)价格为20英镑

entry.tran: 包容性强的;各种人都有的
entry.def: If you describe a group or organization as inclusive, you mean that it allows all kinds of people to belong to it, rather than just one kind of person.

example.ex: The academy is far more inclusive now than it used to be.
example.tran: 该学会的包容性比过去强了很多。

means.word_mean: 1. including much or everything; and especially including stated limits;

sentences.sentence: "his concept of history is modern and inclusive"

auth_sentence.content: Is this nation going to be an inclusive nation?

auth_sentence.content: When we talk about growth it should be inclusive.

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+cluse=clus关闭→返回[家]中关起来
recluse[n.隐士 adj.隐居的]+ive……的→adj.隐遁的, 隐居的
se分开+clus关闭+ive……的→喜欢把自己关起来→隐居的[seclude形容词]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结束, 缔结, 结论
stems_affixes.word_buile: conclude[v.结论;终结]+ion动作或状态→conclusion结束, 结论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 排外主义, 排他主义
stems_affixes.word_buile: exclusion[n.排除, 除外, 被排除在外的事物]+ism主义→n.排外主义, 排他主义
include[v.包括,包含,计入]+ion表名词→inclusion包含, 内含物
re回+cluse=clus关闭→返回[家]中关起来

means.word_mean: 包括…的, 包括一切的

sentences.en: It's an all inclusive price;  there is nothing extra to pay.
sentences.cn: 这是一个包罗一切的价格, 不需再额外付款了。

sentences.en: The bill is inclusive of the food and lodging.
The monthly rent is 15, inclusive of light and water.
sentences.cn: 每月租金15美元, 包括水电费在内。

jushi.english: It's an all inclusive price; there is nothing extra to pay.
jushi.chinese: 这是一个包罗一切的价格,没有别的需要付了。

jushi.english: Our office is open from Monday to Friday inclusive.
jushi.chinese: 我们办公室从星期一到星期五(含)办公。

jushi.english: The monthly rent is $15, inclusive of light and water.
jushi.chinese: 每月租金15美元,包括水电费在内。
